frame.name: Change_event_time
frame.definition:
<def-root>In this frame, an <fen>Agent</fen> or <fen>Cause</fen> changes the timing of an <fen>Event</fen>. The <fen>Event</fen> will then take place at the <fen>Destination_time</fen> or with respect to a <fen>Destination_event</fen>. This can be done with by certain <fen>Means</fen>, in a certain <fen>Manner</fen> or to a certain <fen>Degree</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Cause">The rain</fex> <t>delayed</t> <fex name="Event">the baseball game</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Agent
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Agent</fen> is the animate entity which brings about the change in time of the <fen>Event</fen>. <ex><fex name="Agent">The umpire</fex> <t>postponed</t> <fex name="Event">the game</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Cause
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Cause</fen> is the non-sentient force which brings about the change of time for the <fen>Event</fen>. <ex><fex name="Cause">The rain</fex> <t>delayed</t> <fex name="Event">the baseball game</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Event
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Event</fen> is the occurrence which changes time. <ex><fex name="Event">The opening of the musical</fex> was <t>delayed</t>.</ex></def-root >

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition: <def-root>The Manner is the way in which the time change takes place. <ex><fex name="Agent">My mother</fex> <fex name="Manner">thoughtlessly</fex> <t>delayed</t> <fex name="Event">my salon appointment</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Means
FE.definition: <def-root>The Means describe the way in which the time change is accomplished. <ex><fex name="Agent">The mayor</fex> <t>delayed</t> <fex name="Event">the ribbon-cutting ceremony</fex> <fex name="Means">by pretending to be ill</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Degree</fen> is the extent to which the time change takes place.</def-root>

FE.name: Destination_event
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Destination_event is the occasion which the timing of the Event occurs with respect to.
<ex><fex name="Agent">Consumers</fex> should <t>postpone</t> <fex name="Event">purchasing a new car</fex> <fex name="Destination_event">until their credit rating is acceptable</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Destination_time
FE.definition: <def-root>The Destination_time is the time at which the Event actually occurs. <ex><fex name="Agent">The king</fex> is <t>postponing</t> <fex name="Event">the festival</fex> <fex name="Destination_time">until July</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Interval
FE.definition: <def-root>The Interval between the Landmark_time and the Destination_time may be expressed. <ex><fex name="Event">The lanch</fex> will be <t>delayed</t> <fex name="Interval">for two months</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Landmark_time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Landmark_time</fen> is when the <fen>Event</fen> was originally intended to take place. <ex><fex name="Event">The driving test</fex> was <t>postponed</t> <fex name="Landmark_time">from July</fex> <fex name="Destination_time">to September</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> is the reason or explanation for why the <fen>Event</fen> occurs at a different time. </def-root>

FE.name: Purpose
FE.definition: <def-root>The state-of-affairs that the <fen>Agent</fen> intends to bring about by changing the time the <fen>Event</fen> will take place.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the delay occurred.</def-root>

FE.name: Place
FE.definition: <def-root>The location at which the expected time of the <fen>Event</fen> changes.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: achterstellen.v
lexUnit.definition: iemand slechter behandelen dan een ander

lexUnit.name: vertragen.v
lexUnit.definition: er met opzet voor zorgen dat iets langer duurt of pas later begint

lexUnit.name: verschuiven.v
lexUnit.definition: naar een ander (met name later) tijdstip verplaatsen

lexUnit.name: temporiseren.v
lexUnit.definition: tot een later of beter tijdstip uitstellen, of over een zeker tijdsverloop uitsmeren omdat het je beter uitkomt
